parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Logger Hostname/IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the device.

parameter.name: serialNumber
parameter.label: Logger serial number
parameter.description: Logger serial number, those with format 17xxxx are confirmed to be supported.

parameter.name: refreshTime
parameter.label: Refresh time
parameter.description: Interval the device is polled in sec.

parameter.name: retriesCount
parameter.label: Number of retries
parameter.description: Number of connecting retries before giving up and assuming that logger is offline

parameter.name: maxOfflineTime
parameter.label: maxOfflineTime
parameter.description: Maximum time (in minutes) in which logger is assumed to be offline
